summary: The recording is a conversation in Hindi between a customer and an employee of ITC over a complaint about a damaged multi-grain flour packet. The customer is querying the quality of the product as there is a lot of damage to the packet. She is then asked to provide her details, including her name, address, and phone number. She is also asked to provide the batch number and expiry date of the product. She is informed that an executive will visit her for further inquiries and that the company would provide her with a new package. The customer is told to send a photo of the new package to the employee and is warned that they will not use or consume the product if it is not changed.
speaker_a_summary: Rohit from ITC takes a call in Bengali, Hindi, or Hindi dialect. The caller's voice is breaking and they are upset about a damaged packet. They are asked to provide details to the research department including their address, email, and batch code number from the packet. It is determined that the product was purchased on August 14th, 2023 and expires in 5 KG at the price of Rs. 352. The caller is told that an executive will be sent to collect the packet and will call back. The call ends with thanks and a WhatsApp number provided.
speaker_b_summary: Annaja Vaidya from Ahmedabad is complaining about the multi grain flour he received and insists that he will not eat it or throw it away because it has changed. He wants the company to send him a new package of multi grain flour if it does not have any changes. He can be reached by phone at 96961508452 or 91989898635 or by email at adeniyasaid@gmail.com.
cohere_points:
- Customer is calling a customer service about a damage she found in her multi grain flour packet
- She is speaking in Bengali and Hindi and the customer service is answering in Hindi
- She is asked to give her details and the details of the product and will be called back by an executive 
- The customer is told that a new package will be sent to her address. 
- She is asked to send a photo of the product as well.

Resolution: The customer's issue about the damaged product seems to have been addressed, as they were provided with a complaint number and assurance of a new package or a refund if needed.
Did the caller Displayed Empathy:
Yes

In the conversation, the caller displayed empathy by acknowledging the customer's complaint about the damaged product and assuring them that an executive will visit to collect the packet and address the issue. The caller also thanked the customer and expressed concern for their well-being by suggesting they not consume the product if it is not in good condition.
